ModuleDescription:
Singapore is known as a nation of campaigns. Over the
last 50 years, Singaporeans have seen over 200 national
campaigns that have influenced almost every aspect of
our lives from the way we live to the way we speak, eat,
and behave. This module gives a picture of Singapore’s
modern history and how it has grown as a nation through
the lens of campaigns. Students will have the opportunity
to chronicle the development of the modern Singapore
nation, and the rise of the Singapore psyche and
Singaporean identity via an analysis of some of
Singapore’s most iconic campaigns.
